item.title: About
item.description: Hi there I’m Tulika aka kuttu, a crazy girl in this crazy world, a girl who loves reading, an animal lover , a girl who loves to cook and mostly watching korean dramas has always been my interest. A Crazy Girl Life. is all about the issues,thoughts,dreams,tips everyday a girl has to go through and ways to deal and achieve them in a crazy way. Its all about care, fun, and fashion.

item.title: Hello Friend
item.description: "Hello, friend?" That's lame. Maybe I should give you a name?

item.title: Reasons why am I loved so much.
item.description: I am a Foodie – You will never find me on diet. I will be always with you whenever your gluttonous tongue looks for Biriyani or Butter Paneer Masala. I am very little concerned about my figure but it is magically always in shape for secret reasons! Want to Flatter me – Gift me a Book Yes, guys! That’s it. I won’t bite your pocket asking for expensive gifts. Those Big Eyes – Your Heart will Skip a Bit Those big eyes with Kajal will always allure you to go to your fantasy world and do the imaginary dance like Shahrukh.
